activities: We collect data from applicants that higher education institutions use to evaluate applicants who apply to their programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, customer, system users (applicants). Covers all processed data.
recoursemech: If user does not receive acknowledgement of his/her inquiry or user's inquiry has not been satisfactorily addressed, he/she should contact TRUSTe at http://www.truste.org/consumers/watchdog_complaint.php. TRUSTe will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve user's concerns.
